description: WOMEN EVERYWHERE ARE RAVING ABOUT STUDIO MAKEUP BRUSHES15 PREMIUM BRUSHES - 1 MILLION UNFORGETTABLE LOOKSYou want to look your best. You apply your makeup and it doesn't look right!- Hard and stiff brushes cause streaks and pancaking.- The bristles with makeup fall onto your clothes making a mess.- The brush does not pickup enough makeup and you have to apply over and over.- Pressing down hard with the brush causes it to break or fall apart.It doesn't have to be like that.You are beautiful, and proper makeup brings out the beauty in you. With highlights, lines and color, your beauty is accentuated. However, it's almost impossible to do it right without the proper tools. Without good brushes, the makeup goes on too thick or too thin.Studio makeup brushes,used by professionals in the USA, are manufactured to rigorous standards, and made with the finest goat hair and natural fibers. The brushes are soft so you apply your makeup evenly. You can feel the difference immediately and you will love hearing how beautiful you look.Studio Makeup Brushesare individually wrapped to ensure cleanliness.Each kit contains all the tools you need for the look you want:- Blusher Brush- Foundation Brush- Eyebrow Brush- Lip Gloss Brush- Eyebrow Comb.- Sponge Brush- Concealer Brush- Powder Brush- 7 Different Eye Shadow Brushes - Angled, smudge and 5 others to make your eyes stand out.- Contoured Wood Handles.- Leather Zippered CaseAll the brushes you will need for a precise, repeatable application of your makeup.We give a 30-Day, Money-Back Guarantee; so there's nothing to lose and everything to gain!You'll look and feel better. Click the"Add to Cart"button at the top of the page Now!You deserve to treat your beautiful face with Studio Makeup Brushes... Go on, hit that button now!
title: Makeup Brush Set - 15 Professional Makeup Brushes with Makeup Brush Carrying Case. Our Makeup Brush Sets Have Cheek, Eye, Lip and Face Makeup Brushes. Makeup Applicators for Every Need. Satisfaction Guaranteed.
